publish.title: Publish an event
publish.subtitle: Share your event with the Montreal community. Fill out the form below to publish it.
publish.organizerProfileRequired: You must have an organizer account to publish an event. This allows us to verify your information and guarantee content quality.
publish.organizerTip: Tip: Once your profile is validated, you'll be able to publish as many events as needed.
publish.tip1: Write a clear and catchy title
publish.tip2: Add a detailed description with practical information
publish.tip3: Use relevant tags to improve visibility
publish.tip5: Add custom filters to help users find your event
publish.faq1Question: How long does it take for an event to be visible?
publish.faq1Answer: Events are generally visible immediately after publication. Events created by verified organizers are automatically approved.
publish.faq2Question: Can I modify an event after publication?
publish.faq2Answer: Yes, you can modify your events at any time from your organizer dashboard (coming soon).
publish.faq3Answer: Use the "Custom filters" section to create specific criteria for your event, such as "white attire required" or "meal included".
publish.eventPublished: Your event has been published successfully! It will be visible in a few minutes.
publish.publishError: An error occurred during publication. Please make sure you are logged in as a verified organizer.
publish.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel? All entered data will be lost.
publish.imageRequirements: PNG, JPG, WEBP up to 5MB. Minimum 400x300px, maximum 4000x4000px
publish.imageUrlHelp: Paste an image URL for your event. The image will be automatically imported from Facebook or Eventbrite if you use the import.
publish.imageTooLarge: Image is too large. Maximum size: {maxSize}
publish.imageTooSmall: Image is too small. Minimum dimensions: {minWidth}x{minHeight}px. Current: {width}x{height}px
publish.imageTooBig: Image is too large. Maximum dimensions: {maxWidth}x{maxHeight}px. Current: {width}x{height}px

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your events and view your statistics
dashboard.upgradeToPro: Upgrade to PRO to see details
dashboard.icsAvailablePro: ICS import is available with PRO plan. Upgrade to import your events in bulk.
dashboard.createFirstEvent: Create your first event to get started

pricing.title: Pricing & Plans
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs to promote your events in Montreal
pricing.eventManagementDesc: Create and manage your events easily. Add photos, descriptions, prices and all necessary information. Automatic AI classification for better SEO.
pricing.maxVisibilityDesc: Your events appear on the interactive map, calendar and in search results. Advanced filters by type, ambiance and audience for better discovery.
pricing.promotionsDesc: Highlight your events with targeted promotions: homepage, top of list, or top of map.
pricing.statisticsDesc: Track your event performance: views, clicks, favorites and more with PRO plan.
pricing.bulkImportDesc: Import your events from an ICS file (PRO only). Perfect for organizers with multiple events.
pricing.aiClassificationDesc: Your events are automatically classified and tagged by artificial intelligence (type, genre, ambiance, audience) for better visibility.
pricing.faq1Question: Can I change plans at any time?
pricing.faq1Answer: Yes, you can switch from BASIC to PRO or back to BASIC at any time. Changes take effect immediately.
pricing.faq2Question: What happens if I cancel my PRO subscription?
pricing.faq2Answer: You keep access to PRO features until the end of your billing period. Then, you automatically switch to BASIC plan.
pricing.faq3Answer: Yes, each promotion has a cost that depends on its duration and type. Draft promotions are free and unlimited.
pricing.faq4Answer: No, there is no commitment. You can cancel your PRO subscription at any time without fees.
pricing.ctaDescription: Join hundreds of organizers who trust Pulse Montreal to promote their events.

legalNotice.title: Legal notice
legalNotice.editorDesc: The Pulse Montreal site is published by:
legalNotice.publicationDirectorDesc: The publication director is the legal representative of Pulse Montreal.
legalNotice.intellectualPropertyDesc: All content on this site (texts, images, logos, etc.) is the property of Pulse Montreal or its partners and is protected by intellectual property laws.
legalNotice.personalDataDesc: Personal data collected on this site is processed in accordance with our
legalNotice.responsibilityDesc: Pulse Montreal strives to ensure the accuracy of information published on the site. However, we cannot guarantee the completeness, accuracy or timeliness of the information.
legalNotice.externalLinksDesc: The site may contain links to external sites. Pulse Montreal is not responsible for the content of these external sites.
legalNotice.contactDesc: For any questions regarding the legal notice, you can contact us at:

termsOfService.title: Terms of service
termsOfService.objectDesc: These Terms of Service (ToS) govern the use of the Pulse Montreal site and its services. By accessing the site, you accept these ToS without reservation.
termsOfService.acceptanceDesc: Use of the site implies full and complete acceptance of these ToS. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use the site.
termsOfService.siteUseDesc: You agree to use the site in accordance with the law and these ToS. It is prohibited to use the site to:
termsOfService.siteUseList1: Publish illegal, offensive or defamatory content
termsOfService.siteUseList4: Attempt to access the site in an unauthorized manner
termsOfService.userAccountDesc: To publish events, you must create an organizer account. You are responsible for the confidentiality of your credentials and all activities performed with your account.
termsOfService.publishedContentDesc: By publishing an event, you guarantee that you have the necessary rights and that the content is accurate and complies with the law. Pulse Montreal reserves the right to moderate or delete any non-compliant content.
termsOfService.intellectualPropertyDesc: All elements of the site (texts, images, logos, etc.) are protected by copyright. Any unauthorized reproduction is prohibited.
termsOfService.liabilityLimitationDesc: Pulse Montreal cannot be held responsible for direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of the site or the impossibility of using it.
termsOfService.tosModificationDesc: Pulse Montreal reserves the right to modify these ToS at any time. Modifications take effect upon their publication on the site.
termsOfService.applicableLawDesc: These ToS are governed by Quebec and Canadian law. Any dispute will be submitted to the competent courts of Montreal, Quebec.
termsOfService.contactDesc: For any questions regarding the ToS, contact us at:

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy policy
privacyPolicy.introductionDesc: Pulse Montreal is committed to protecting the confidentiality of your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use and protect your information.
privacyPolicy.collectedDataList2: Navigation data: IP address, browser type, pages visited
privacyPolicy.collectedDataList4: Cookies: to improve user experience (with consent)
privacyPolicy.dataUsageList3: Personalize your experience (including recommendations based on your preferences)
privacyPolicy.dataSharingDesc: We do not sell your personal data. We may share your data with:
privacyPolicy.dataSharingList1: Our service providers (hosting, analytics with consent)
privacyPolicy.dataSharingList2: Legal authorities if required by law
privacyPolicy.dataRetentionDesc: We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to provide our services or comply with our legal obligations.
privacyPolicy.yourRightsDesc: In accordance with Quebec and Canadian legislation, you have the right to:
privacyPolicy.yourRightsList4: Object to processing of your data
privacyPolicy.yourRightsList5: Withdraw your consent at any time
privacyPolicy.cookiesDesc: We use cookies to improve your experience. You can manage your cookie preferences via the consent banner or your browser settings.
privacyPolicy.securityDesc: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss or destruction.
privacyPolicy.modificationsDesc: We may modify this privacy policy. Modifications will be published on this page with the update date.
privacyPolicy.contactDesc: For any questions regarding your personal data, contact us at:

error.title: Authentication Error
error.configuration: There is a problem with the server configuration. Check that environment variables are correctly configured.
error.accessDenied: You do not have permission to access this page.
error.verification: The verification link has expired or has already been used.
error.oauthSignin: Error during OAuth connection. Check that Google OAuth is correctly configured.
error.oauthCallback: Error during OAuth callback. Check redirect URLs in Google Cloud Console.
error.oauthCreateAccount: Unable to create account. Check database configuration.
error.emailCreateAccount: Unable to create account with this email.
error.oauthAccountNotLinked: An account already exists with this email address. Sign in with your usual method.
error.sessionRequired: You must be logged in to access this page.
error.default: An unexpected error occurred. If the problem persists, check OAuth configuration.
error.debugCheck1: Check that GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID and GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET are configured in Vercel
error.debugCheck2: Check that NEXTAUTH_URL matches your domain (https://pulse-event.ca)
error.debugCheck3: Check redirect URLs in Google Cloud Console
